mapper.select: SELECT ROWNUM, EMAIL, NICKNAME, USERBANNED, JOINDATE FROM USERINFO WHERE USERBANNED > 5 ORDER BY rownum desc OFFSET (#{currPage}-1) * #{amount} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{amount} ROWS ONLY
SELECT COUNT(EMAIL) FROM USERINFO WHERE USERBANNED > 5

SELECT ROWNUM, P.PARTYNAME, I.NICKNAME, P.PARTYBANNED, P.CREATEDATE FROM PARTY P JOIN PARTYUSER U ON P.PARTYCODE = U.PARTYCODE JOIN USERINFO I ON U.EMAIL = I.EMAIL WHERE P.PARTYBANNED > 5 AND U.AUTHCODE = 2 ORDER BY rownum desc OFFSET (#{currPage}-1) * #{amount} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{amount} ROWS ONLY
SELECT COUNT(P.PARTYNAME) FROM PARTY P JOIN PARTYUSER U ON P.PARTYCODE = U.PARTYCODE JOIN USERINFO I ON U.EMAIL = I.EMAIL WHERE P.PARTYBANNED > 5 AND U.AUTHCODE = 2

SELECT ROWNUM, P.PARTYCODE, P.PARTYNAME, P.PARTYSCORE, I.NICKNAME, P.PARTYBANNED, P.CREATEDATE, (SELECT count(*) from partyuser where partycode=p.partycode) AS PARTYMEMBER FROM PARTY P JOIN PARTYUSER U ON P.PARTYCODE = U.PARTYCODE JOIN USERINFO I ON U.EMAIL = I.EMAIL WHERE P.PARTYBANNED > -1 AND U.AUTHCODE = 2 ORDER BY rownum desc OFFSET (#{currPage}-1) * #{amount} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{amount} ROWS ONLY
SELECT COUNT(P.PARTYCODE) FROM PARTY P JOIN PARTYUSER U ON P.PARTYCODE = U.PARTYCODE JOIN USERINFO I ON U.EMAIL = I.EMAIL WHERE P.PARTYBANNED > -1 AND U.AUTHCODE = 2
